name: Trump'sTweets(unofficial)
0:
”Alexa, what's my Flash Briefing?”
”Alexa, play my Flash Briefing”
skdetail:
Flash Briefing Skill
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
des:
Have Alexa read Trump's unofficial public tweets to you whenever you want. 

Disclaimer: This Alexa Skill/Flash Briefing is in no way sponsored or endorsed by Donald Trump, The Trump Foundation, Twitter, or any other party. This skill/flash briefing does NOT imply sponsorship, endorsement or ownership. This skill merely reads tweets from Twitter accounts. Tweets from non-private accounts are public information (Twitter TOS: https://twitter.com/en/tos).
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
